thread.title: Oil price plunge dents Santos revenue
thread.title_full: Oil price plunge dents Santos revenue

title: Oil price plunge dents Santos revenue
text:
Fri, Jul 17, 2015, 9:47 AM AEST - Australia Markets open in 13 mins. Oil price plunge dents Santos revenue AAP – 8 minutes ago Print 
Santos has suffered a 19 per cent slide in revenue in the past year after a dive in oil prices offset increased production from its giant LNG project in Papua New Guinea. 
The company reported sales revenue of $786 million for the June quarter, down five per cent on the previous quarter and 19 per cent from the same period last year. 
Production was up 12 per cent from a year ago at 14.3 million barrels of oil equivalent, while capital expenditure was down 65 per cent due to the company's cost cutting efforts. @y7finance on Twitter, become a fan on Facebook AAP
